stories.headline: Addressing Antigravity Bans and Reinstating Access
Joint Statement from OpenAI and Microsoft
stories.summary: Microsoft and OpenAI continue to work closely across research, engineering, and product development, building on years of deep collaboration and shared success.

stories.headline: OpenAI Fires an Employee for Prediction Market Insider Trading
Introducing the Stateful Runtime Environment for Agents in Amazon Bedrock
stories.summary: Stateful Runtime for Agents in Amazon Bedrock brings persistent orchestration, memory, and secure execution to multi-step AI workflows powered by OpenAI.

stories.headline: Scaling AI for everyone
stories.summary: Today we’re announcing $110B in new investment at a $730B pre money valuation. This includes $30B from SoftBank, $30B from NVIDIA, and $50B from Amazon.

stories.headline: The Eternal Promise: A History of Attempts to Eliminate Programmers
OpenAI and Amazon announce strategic partnership
stories.summary: OpenAI and Amazon announce a strategic partnership bringing OpenAI’s Frontier platform to AWS, expanding AI infrastructure, custom models, and enterprise AI agents.

stories.headline: OpenAI agrees with Dept. of War to deploy models in their classified network
An update on our mental health-related work
stories.summary: OpenAI shares updates on its mental health safety work, including parental controls, trusted contacts, improved distress detection, and recent litigation developments.

stories.headline: US and Israel launch strikes on Iran, as Trump says ‘massive’ campaign underway
Xiaomi launches 17 Ultra smartphone, an AirTag clone, and an ultra slim powerbank
stories.summary: We round up everything Xiaomi announced at its Mobile World Congress event.

stories.headline: Why China’s humanoid robot industry is winning the early market
stories.summary: China’s push into humanoid robots is accelerating, with domestic firms shipping more units and iterating faster than U.S. competitors in a still-nascent market.

stories.headline: India disrupts access to popular developer platform Supabase with blocking order
stories.summary: India, one of Supabase’s biggest markets, is seeing patchy access after a government block order.

stories.headline: OpenAI fires employee for using confidential info on prediction markets
stories.summary: The company said such trades violates its internal company policies about using confidential information for personal gain.

stories.headline: Pentagon moves to designate Anthropic as a supply-chain risk
stories.summary: "We don't need it, we don't want it, and will not do business with them again," the president wrote in the post.
